translation.help_message: Press <Key1/> + <Key2/> to overlay a black background over the entire screen
translation.toggle_enableoverlay_description: Press <Key/> to return to the plugin
translation.toggle_allowtouch_description: Keep the touchscreen responsive while the overlay is active
translation.toggle_mutemic_description: Set the microphone volume to zero while the overlay is active
translation.toggle_mutesound_description: Set the speaker volume to zero while the overlay is active
translation.toggle_offanykey_description: Turns off the overlay when any key is pressed.
translation.toggle_offuponwaking_description: Turns off the overlay after resuming from sleep.
translation.options_modal: This magic plugin applies a black overlay to the screen, emulating a turned-off display on the Steam Deck OLED. To reduce OLED flicker, set the screen brightness to 100%, enable the overlay, and then adjust the effective brightness using the opacity slider.
